body_html:
I agree it is not necessary, but does seem like a "nice to have" addition.

Another point, is that nn.ModuleDict is more natural than nn.ModuleList, because modules and parameters are stored in an OrderedDict already.
body_text:
I agree it is not necessary, but does seem like a "nice to have" addition.
Another point, is that nn.ModuleDict is more natural than nn.ModuleList, because modules and parameters are stored in an OrderedDict already.
body:
I agree it is not necessary, but does seem like a "nice to have" addition.

Another point, is that nn.ModuleDict is more natural than nn.ModuleList, because modules and parameters are stored in an OrderedDict already.
